meanings.sent1: The dog left shits in the yard.

meanings.definition: An expression of anger or frustration
meanings.sent1: He let out a string of shits when he realized he missed the bus.
meanings.sent2: She muttered shits under her breath as she struggled with the door.
meanings.sent3: His reaction to losing the game was a loud shits!
